Description: Oakley Sunglass Lot(1) Flak Jacket Custom Paint SplatterBlack Iridium - Standard Lens(3) M-Frame Custom, New Blue, Metallic GreyGold Iridium - Heater LensYellow - Heater LensFire Iridium - New Hybrid VentedPersimmon - New Hybrid +Red Iridium - New Hybrid+Red Iridium - Sweep Listing included 4 complete pairs of Oakley shades, with a few extra M-Frame lenses; Yellow heater has light scratches but still okay to wear, perfect for yard-work which is what I used them for. The persimmon New Hybrid is excellent condition just a couple minute imperfections otherwise near flawless. Fire vented New Hybrid is in fairly decent condition, there are marks on either side but can still be worn if they do not bother you - these were also used around the yard. Flak Jacket's were recently painted in a white/blue splatter theme, the Flak has brand new genuine white oakley sock kit installed - the lenses on them do show some signs of wear, they are genuine black iridium standard cut. White/Blue M-Frame was also recently painted, with an additional white pearl clear coat applied hence why it's a bit lighter in tone - they have some small imperfections to the finish but do not bear any serious flaws. It's mounted with Gold Iridium heater lens that's in excellent condition with only some minor imperfections which should not pose any issues to the user. New Blue M-Frame are in excellent condition, the frames do not appear to have any flaws that I can find. They are paired with +Red Iridium sweep lens which apart from a tiny scuff on the right the mounting hook has parted away some, however I've mounted/dismounted the lens a number of times (20+) over the past 2 years without incident. So long as you're weary of how to properly remove a lens you should be fine, as the visual condition of the lens is just too nice to go to waste. Metallic Grey M-Frame are in good condition, the temple tips were shortened to wear while riding this with a helmet otherwise they are excellent condition cosmetically speaking. The lens is +Red Iridium New Hybrid lens, which is in good condition as well they have some superficial surface wear imperfection although they do not obstruct my general FOV while wearing them.
